page.title: 07HOME LIFE & HOUSING
page.content: Most people go on{holidays}in Britain or on the continent of Europe.Most people have a holiday at Christmas time visiting friends or relatives. Lots of people watch{television for News and Entertainment . Our{pets}are cats, dogs and rabbits plus many other kinds of animals we look after in our homes. Peoples{menus}vary considerably. Pubs and Hotels in this selected area also give many varied selections of meals. Houses in this{area}are generally clean and are built mostly out of brick and have tiled roofs.An average sort of house would cost from{Â£15,000 -to{Â£60,000}they have gardens where plants are grown and some have ponds which contain pet fish.
